article_text:
David Joles – DML - Star Tribune

Gallery: The pain of loss is etched on the faces of Minneapolis North players as they receive thanks from fans following their 28-12 loss to Dawson-Boyd during playoff action Saturday, Nov. 15, 2014, at Hopkins High in Hopkins, MN.

og.description:
1A: Dawson-Boyd reaches Prep Bowl with victory over Minneapolis North
The Blackjacks, who upset defending champion Mahnomen last week, held off the Polars 28-12.
og.title: 1A: Dawson-Boyd 28, Minneapolis North 12
